question.title: AI Tools for Java + Spring Boot + Kafka Stack: ChatGPT Pro or Claude Pro?
question.body:
I’m thinking of getting an AI plan for work and I’m torn between ChatGPT Pro and Claude Pro.

My stack: Java + Spring Boot + Kafka, microservices, and hexagonal architecture. I’d mostly use it for:

  • Generating code and refactoring

  • Architecture questions and best practices

  • Kafka, events, microservices, etc.

  • Deep technical explanations (not just tutorial-level stuff)

Has anyone tried both? Which one performs better for this kind of stack? Thanks!
